House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02850
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A TASK FORCE TO RECOMMEND A UNIFORM STRATEGY TO PROTECT WOMEN AGAINST VIOLENT CRIME

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-08-08
          -The Committee Secretariat was tasked to draft a bill in substitution of HB Numbered 1471,2592, 2664, 2850 and 5153. HB No. 3813 will be tackled separately because it covers another subject matter and HB No. 5584 will also be taken up separately per request of the author, because his proposal's coverage includes lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender group (LGBT) and not specific to VAWC.
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-08-01
          -17th Mother Committee Meeting. Consideration/Approval of the Draft Substitute Bill re: House Bill Nos. 1471, 2592, 2664, 2850,3813, 5153 and 5584
MOTHER BILL: HB08655
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY ON 2016-08-17
